definition: front/forward/ahead/first/top (followed by a number)/future/ago/before/BC (e.g. 前293年)/former/formerly

sentences.english: Perfessor Lee retired ten years ago.
We have fully embraced the Millennium Development Goals.
sentences.chinese: 我們全力擁護新前年的發展目標。

sentences.english: Two years ago, the father of my classmates even rolling car with people any longer.
sentences.chinese: 前年，我同學的爸爸就是連車帶人滾下去了。

sentences.english: I had bought the small bottle of perfume the summer before last: Bvlgari's 'Amethyst'.
sentences.chinese: 右邊是我前年夏天買的名爲“紫水晶”的小瓶香水。

sentences.english: I read it the summer before last.
sentences.chinese: 我是前年夏天的時候讀的。

sentences.english: Triclosan is a powerful anti-bacterial that was developed nearly 50 years ago.
sentences.chinese: 三氯生是一種強效抗菌劑，近50前年研製。

sentences.english: Cost less the accumulated depreciation claimed in prior years' income tax.
sentences.chinese: 成本減以前年度申報所得稅的累計折舊。

sentences.english: She said she was inspired when she saw early morning fireworks kicking off the marathon the year before.
sentences.chinese: 她說前年看到啓動馬拉松比賽的清晨禮花大受鼓舞。

sentences.english: The conclusions audited in the previous years, etc…
sentences.chinese: 以前年度審計的結果等。

sentences.english: The Speaker of the Mauritian Parliament, Mr Prem Ramnah, headed a delegation to China two years ago and his visit scored positive results.
sentences.chinese: 毛里求斯議長拉姆納率團於前年訪華並取得積極成果。

definition: late last year/the end of last year
within the year/in the middle of the year/mid-year
